statements: DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '456e7890-e12a-34b5-c678-901234567890' AND rating > 4;
DELETE FROM survey_results WHERE customer_id = 10 AND satisfaction_level > 3;
DELETE FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date < '2022-01-01' AND satisfaction_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE joining_date < '2022-01-01' AND tier = 'Silver';
DELETE FROM survey_results WHERE survey_rating <= 3 AND survey_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerSurveyHistory WHERE customer_id = 101 AND survey_id = 200;
